attributes.action: Move all schools exempt SEN schools above primary level online till christmas
attributes.background: Close all schools to help slow the spread of coronavirus cases

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

When the Government closed schools previous vulnerable children were exempt from these closures: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/schools-colleges-and-early-years-settings-to-close
